transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir.

Customer: Sir namaskar.
Customer: Madan main Suraj and the great Arshana Meerut se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Okay sir.

Customer: Aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri?
Executive: Ji sir.

Customer: Sir haan ji TrustSeal mera plan hai.
Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Sir abhi meri Abhishek se baat hui thi wo kya naam hai 8-10 din 11-12 din pehle.
Customer: Pata nahi usne kya kara hai kya nahi uske baad na to call aari.
Customer: Pehle aati thi din mein 6-6 7-7 8-8 call aati thi aur ab ek do ek bhi nahi aati ab ye ho gaya pata nahi kya hua hai aur kya naam hai mera kareeb teen char mahine ho gaye.
Customer: Plan kuch jyada hi ho gaye.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai na to TrustSeal ka certificate aaj tak aaya plan lene se jab liya nahi tha maine mere ko itna pareshan kara gaya naye naye number se itna call 100 mein din mein 50-50 call ki plan lo plan lo tumhare teen din mein yu kar denge wo kar denge char mahine ho gaye aaj tak to kuch hua nahi.
Customer: Mere yahan se itna mal all over India ke liye jata hai unse certificate parcel nahi ho raha mere ghar.
Executive: Theek hai main ek bar check kar leta hun aap mere ko 10 minute dijiye main call back karta hun aapko ek bar check karke aapka certificate ka aur matlab kab tak aapka deliver ho jayega kya hai wo ek bar main check kar deta hun.
Customer: Nahi sir wo to wo to wo to nahi aaye to bhi chalega mera mere ko usse kam thodi milega maine to unse bol diya mat do mere ko nahi chahiye yo mere ko to kam chahiye mere ko leads nahi aari call nahi aari abhi 11-12 din pehle aap check kar lena khub acha chal raha tha jab se Abhishek ne baat kari hai sari aisi taisi kar di pata nahi kya hua.
Executive: Nahi main ek bar check kar leta hun ye bhi aapko main ek bar check kar
Executive: ke aapka pura catalog fir main aapko ek bar connect karta hun.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- No buyleads after talking to Abhishek.

- TrustSeal certificate not received yet.

- Facing issues with the plan.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive will check catalog and connect again.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, certificate, plan
